Method.doc:
Bind hotkeys for this spoon

Parameters:
 * mapping: a table with the callbacks
Returns:
 * None
Method.name: bindHotkeys
parameters: * mapping: a table with the callbacks

Method.doc:
Reset the timer

Parameters:
 * None
Returns:
 * None
Method.name: cancel

Method.desc: Pause or resume the existing countdown.
Method.doc:
Pause or resume the existing countdown.

Parameters:
 * None
Returns:
 * None
Method.name: pauseOrResume

Method.desc: Set the progress of visual indicator to progress.
Method.doc:
Set the progress of visual indicator to progress.

Parameters:
 * progress
   a relative number specifying the new progress (0.0 - 1.0)
Returns:
 * None
Method.name: setProgress
parameters: * progress a relative number specifying the new progress (0.0 - 1.0)

Method.desc: Start a countdown for `minutes` minutes immediately. Calling this method again will kill the existing countdown instance.
Method.doc:
Start a countdown for `minutes` minutes immediately. Calling this method again will kill the existing countdown instance.

Parameters:
 * minutes - How many minutes
             Defaults to obj.defaultLenMinutes
 * callback: optional: a function to call when the timer 
           is up. it takes one parameters (minutes)
           the minutes that were requested.
           The callback is not called if timer is cancelled
Returns:
 * None
Method.name: startFor
parameters: * minutes - How many minutes Defaults to obj.defaultLenMinutes
* callback: optional: a function to call when the timer is up. it takes one parameters (minutes) the minutes that were requested. The callback is not called if timer is cancelled

Method.desc: Start a countdown until time indicated in parameter.
Method.doc:
Start a countdown until time indicated in parameter.

Parameters:
 * callback: optional: a function to call when the timer 
           is up. it takes one parameters (minutes)
           the minutes that were requested.
Method.name: startUntil
parameters: * callback: optional: a function to call when the timer is up. it takes one parameters (minutes) the minutes that were requested.

Variable.desc: If true, always show the menu bar icon.
Variable.doc:
If true, always show the menu bar icon.
  if false, only show when timer active
  (shows pause, cancel toggle)

if false, only show when timer active
  (shows pause, cancel toggle)

Variable.desc: set to nil to turn off notification when time's up or provide a hs.notify notification
Variable.doc: set to nil to turn off notification when time's up or provide a hs.notify notification
Variable.name: nofity

Variable.desc: if true, make defaultLenMinutes the last time length used
Variable.doc: if true, make defaultLenMinutes the last time length used

Variable.desc: Format to display the warning.

Format to display the warning.
  It takes two integers: hours and minutes

Variable.desc: Do we show progress warnings. A progress warning happens
Variable.doc:
Do we show progress warnings. A progress warning happens
 at logarithmic intervals: 1, 2, 4, 8, 16... minutes
 before timer expiration
Variable.name: warningShow
Variable.stripped_doc:
at logarithmic intervals: 1, 2, 4, 8, 16... minutes
 before timer expiration

Variable.desc: for how many seconds to show the warning
Variable.doc: for how many seconds to show the warning
Variable.name: warningshowDuration
